sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: Sets the value of a slider or scroll bar specified by widgetID to value. It moves the thumb on the slider or scroll bar to the appropriate location and calls the slider's action procedure with the new value.
sections.text_content: Sets the value of a slider or scroll bar specified by widgetID to value. It moves the thumb on the slider or scroll bar to the appropriate location and calls the slider's action procedure with the new value.
sections.mdown_content: Sets the value of a slider or scroll bar specified by *widgetID* to *value*. It moves the thumb on the slider or scroll bar to the appropriate location and calls the slider's *action procedure* with the new value.

sections.title: Example
sections.text_content: See GUI.SetScrollAmount for an example of GUI.SetSliderValue.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.
